Chinese.name: TDSQL PostgreSQL 备份文件同步到 COS
Chinese.description: 本示例使用定时触发器，完成 TDSQL PostgreSQL 备份文件同步到 COS
Chinese.attention: 该函数模板仅供 COS 控制台使用，请勿自行创建

English.name: CosTbaseBackup
English.description: This demo uses scheduled trigger and SCF to copy TDSQL PostgreSQL backup file to COS automaticly
English.attention: This function template is only provided to COS console, please do not use it by yourself
